body:
Also, it is vague now in this table which one of bazel or cmake is used in the builds. In the table headers, let's replace "Bazel/Cmake" with "Build tools" and in the table itself, let's have the name of the tool included  with the version.
For example, instead of 0.4.5, we will have Bazel 0.4.5
